body:
So I did an AMA a while back and it got pretty much no responses, :(, so here is another one!
So go ahead and ask me anything!
:P
body_tagged:

title: OscarElNana AMA!!!

replies.body:
Don't worry, I will ask your first question and get you responses

Favourite Song?

Favourite Youtuber?

What is the story behind the lama picture?
replies.body_tagged:
Don't worry, I will ask your first question and get you responses

Favourite Song?

Favourite Youtuber?

What is the story behind the lama picture?

replies.body:
Thanks! <3

I have loads, just a few would be Circles- The Eden Project, Pegboard Nerds- Here it Comes, Nuclear- Zomboy.

Again, I have loads. Lukeisnotsexy, Emma Blackery, Troy98, The Gaming Lemon, JackSepticEye and Onision are some.

Llamas With Hats is probably my favorite YouTube series ever. I have loved it ever since my friend first showed it to me. If you haven't already, please go and watch all 12 episodes. It is amazing. Carl sort of became my idol, if you like, so now my picture on most things is either him or one of his quotes.

replies.body: I ended up reffing Bezerk Vs. Bad Company in the semis. Nintendoboy had to go, so I came became ref about 15 minutes in. Despite losing connection a few times, it was an incredible game to watch.

replies.body: Both. In a sandwich. But only with pepperoni included.
